value: Write a program to print 'exists' if entered key already exists in the dictionary and print 'not exists' if the entered key does not exist.

dict1={"name":"Raju","marks":56}
a=input ("enter the value=")
if (a=="name"):
print (dict1["name"])
elif(a=="marks"):
print(dict1["marks"])
else:
print ("invalid input")
